title: UDL-Based Instructional Design Course for Inclusive Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Basic Knowledge of Education Policy
context.additional_context: Mathematics curriculum design for diverse learners in small classrooms with digital device accessibility.

learning_goals: Design at least three multimodal representations of mathematics instruction applying UDL principles
Develop assessment rubrics considering learner diversity and apply them to project-based evaluations
Acquire the ability to create personalized learning materials using digital tools
Write lesson plans reflecting inclusive education policy requirements

resources: Educational Material Samples for Diverse Learning Styles

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
